roguehouseguide-text:
Rogue House Community Rules & Server Guide Your Journey Begins... Join the Discord! - Vintage Story Wiki Welcome to Rogue House! The focus of the Rogue House is an immersive, challenging PvE experience without being too punishing. We love to survive, build, chisel, roleplay and have fun together in a constructive way.
Starter Guide - Progression Guide - Claims Guide - Chat Group Guide Rules: -Stealing is not permitted. Claimed or not, do not take things from other players. -You are not to assume a player structure is abandoned. It may not be. Ask an admin if you really think you need the place. -Cheating mods like blocksoverlay or AMFinder are not to be used here. We have an Anti-Cheat Mod that blocks client mods. Refer to the Allowed Client Mod List for mods that are permitted. Direct mod requests to our Discord. -Have some chat etiquette. Keep it more game focused. Don't flood the general chat with nonsense. Combine your messages instead of sending each thought. Use whispers "/msg PlayerName your message" and chat groups and the Proximity chat or VOIP for more personal business or adventuring parties. Building Rules: -Do not build near other claims without permission. Setting up right next door to someone without asking is rude. Leave room for others (and yourself) to be able to expand. -Do not build in or around cities without permission. This goes along with the above. They have particular requirements. -No floating over water or air path bridges. They are horribly ugly and we do not want the eye pollution in our skys or waters. They will be removed. Water bridges are acceptable only when they look nice and like an actual bridge. and of course -Be respectful to yourself and the community. Settings:
-75% Hunger Speed
-75% Food Spoilage
-Base HP Set to 15
-Items stored in a Player Corpse on Death
-30 Days per Month
-1 Game Day is 96 Minutes (Default 48)
-Calender Paused When Empty
-Chiseling for Most Blocks
-Rifts Enabled
-"Sometimes" Temporal Storms
-Wind Affects Entities
-Propick radius of 6 (default)
-Proximity Chat Tab With RP Features
-General Chat Linked to Discord RogueRaiden: Server Owner & Builder Miriel: Server Admin & Builder Help keep the server running with Ko-fi! Expanded claims available with monthly Memberships :D
roguehouse-clientmodlist-text: Client Mods Permitted For Use Due to cheat mods on the mod database and users caught using said cheat mods, client mods are blocked unless directly allowed. This is a list of recommended mods, there are too many client mods overall to keep a list here. Direct any client mod requests to our Discord. 01. Accessibility Tweaks - Allows adjusting of nearly every sound and visual effect and more to help in all kinds of ways. Pickaxe sound on rock too loud? Piercing wolf howls? Turn them down! Open the menu with default F8. 02. Auto Loot - After harvesting a corpse, the items move directly into your inventory and closes the menu. 03. Auto Walk - Adds a keybind for auto walking. 04. Better Stepping - Fixes stepping onto slabs/stairs/snow and other steppable blocks while not exactly aligned. 05. Butchering Fix - Press hotkey (default: Shift + B) to disable block's hitboxes where harvestable creature is in. 06. Chat Translator - Translate incoming or outgoing messages into other languages. 07. Easy Light Levels - Small mod that allows you to quickly and easily view the light levels of the surrounding blocks. 08. Emote Menu - Press the default key 'K' to open a radial menu with all of the game emotes available! 09. Extra Info - Useful information for handbook, blocks, items and entities. 10. Interfaces And Rainbows - Allows customizing the colors of your inventory screens. 11. Natural Night - Adjusts the ambient color of dawn, dusk and night time from the crazy red to a more realistic blue. 12. NoHands - Press a hotkey (R by default) in order to move your currently held item stack into a backpack slot. Need both of your hands free? There's a hotkey (Shift + R by default) for that too. 13. Pixel Waypoints - Replaced the vanilla waypoint icons with more visible, pixelated ones. 14. PlayerList - Shows a player list when you hold down tab. 15. QP's Client Side Tools - Command for sharing location and held item in chat. 16. Room Indicator - HUD element that shows what type of room you are in. 17. Simple Emote Menu - Adds simple menu where you can select emotes. 18. Simple Hud Clock - Adds a clock to the hud with helpful information. 19. Status HUD - This is a not-so-simple mod with the objective of relaying information to the player. If your character can feel it, then you should see it. 20. Target Dot - This retextures the very large 'plus' crosshair with a much smaller 'dot' crosshair. (Both Small and Medium are allowed) 21. Temperature Scales - Allows displaying temperatures in Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin. 22. Temporal Storm Gear - The 'Sanity Gear' meter in the middle will turn rusty when a storm is near. 23. Xandus Inventory Tweaks - A collection of small tweaks to improve the inventory handling.
roguehouse-servermodlist-text: Rogue House Mod List 01. A Culinary Artillery - Library mod adding all the tools and features for enhanced foods and recipes. 02. Acorns - Adds Acorns as a food source and a Wooden Mallet to crack the Acorn shells. 03. Ancient Tools - Mod adding new crafting systems and fancy carts. 04. Animal Cages - Small utility mod that adds cages for capturing, transporting and releasing animals. Configured only for pets. 05. Axle in Blocks - New blocks that hide axles, gears and transmissions in brick, dry stone and planks. 06. Beehive Kiln - Large kiln to smelt many items. 07. Better Jonas Devices - Adjusts the functionality of the Rift Ward, Nightvision helmet and Base return teleporter to be a little more useful. 08. Blacksmith Name - Adds line to itemInfo of tools/weapons heads and ready tools which were created by a player using anvil. 09. Bricklayers - Utilizing Expanded Matter, this adds tons of colorful clay and glass blocks along with many decor items. Let your creativity flow! 10. Bullseye - Overhauled Ranged combat with a new aiming system, roles for bows, obsidian & bamboo arrows, iron & steel spears and more! 11. Calendar - Simple paper Calendar to hang on the wall that shows the current Month and Day at a glance. 12. CaN Market - Adds shop blocks for buying/selling. 13. Cancel Book Signature - The same author can now remove the signature from books and parchments. 14. Carry On - Crouch + hold right click with both hands empty to pick up chests, vessels, crates and other things. Do the same action without targeting a block to place some blocks on your back with a speed penalty. 15. Cats - Utilizes Pet AI to add in several tameable cats with a couple accessories. 16. Chisel Tools - Iron Tier tools for significant Quality of Life features for chiselers. 17. CommonLib - Library mod for DArkHekRoMaNT's mods. 18. Crateful - Changes the insertion mechanics of crates to no longer require that the item type inside of the crate also be in your active hotbar slot. 19. DecO'Clock - Adds to the game several types of mechanical clocks showing the current game time. 20. Doff And Don Again - Quality of Life keybinds to quickly place your armor onto an armor stand, take from the armor stand or toss onto the ground. 21. Expanded Matter - Library mod adding lots of basic resources and ways to obtain them. 22. Expanded Foods - Utilizes A Culinary Artillery to greatly increase the available food dishes and recipes for them. 23. Fauna of the Stone Age: Caninae - A collection of dogs from the subfamily Caninae, these animals will act as possible predators for farm animals and the player, elusive prey sources or even pets. 24. Fauna of the Stone Age: Capreolinae - A collection of deer from the subfamily Capreolinae, these shy animals will act as a challenging prey source and potential danger for players and their crops. 25. Fauna of the Stone Age: Pantherinae - A collection of big and medium cats of the subfamily Pantherinae, these powerful predators will act as an elusive danger players will have to avoid, and protect their livestock from. 26. Instruments - Pick one up and start playing some music! Uses ABC files just like Starbound or LOTR: Online to play music in-game. The server has a collection of music loaded, but the mod can also load files locally. 27. Joy of Sailing - Adds sailboats with working sail! 28. Mr Mannequin - A mannequin to display your clothes! 29. Meteoric Expansion - Watch meteor showers streak through the sky, individually or in clusters. Individual meteors that crash down will destroy unprotected blocks and imbed an ore rich meteor into the area. 30. More Animals - This mod adds new animals for you to hunt or nurture as you please, such as Ring-necked Pheasants, Golden Pheasants and Capercaillies. Also adds a new nest box block which uses the recipe of the henbox, all birds can lay eggs in it and sit on it to incubate any fertile eggs held inside. The new nest box displays what species can use the nest box, what eggs are contained inside it, what species laid the eggs and whether the eggs are fertile or not when you move your mouse over the nestbox block. 31. More Roofing - More roofing blocks out of a selection of materials. 32. Pet AI - Library mod for taming creatures as Pets or Mounts. 33. Pileful - Changes the mechanics of pile creation, as well as taking and putting items into piles. 34. Player Corpse - Stashes your items into a humanoid skeleton on death with a map waypoint. 35. PlayerList - Shows a player list when you hold down tab. (Configurable) 36. Pottery Wheel - A spinning wheel to make pottery with! 37. Primitive Survival - Forms of fishing, animal traps, fireworks, earth worms.. This mod has a bit of everything. 38. Rogue House Additions - Custom mod for the Rogue House server. Utilizes the Pet AI and Expanded Matter libraries. Extra creatures, pets, decoritive blocks, clothing, tons of tweaks and much more! 39. RPVoiceChat - This mod implements VOIP to allow people on a server together to chat in-game based on proximity. 40. Scarecrow - Simple scarecrow that keeps some animals away from your crops. 41. Simple Wind Direction - Enables random wind direction that affects entities. 42. Spyglass - Craftable item for getting a close look at things. 43. Simple Elevator (Currently Outdated) - Adds Elevator blocks for quickly getting up and down. 44. Stone Bake Oven - Multiblock oven for baking! 45. Stone Quarry - Use metal plugs to quarry stone in large slabs to take materials from later. 46. Storage Options - Various containers for storing your items. 47. Teleportation Runes - An item based 'warp' system. Craft the rune, bind it to a Beacon, then use the Rune to travel back to the bound location. 48. VSQuest - Framework for adding quest giving entities. 49. Wildcraft - Adds in all sorts of herbs and poultices. 50. Wild Farming Revival - Expansion to farming mechanics such as growing trees, spreading forests, growth of mushrooms, seaweed and vines plus some more. 51. Wolf Taming - Utilizes Pet AI to tame wolf pups and domesticate them into dogs. Includes some armor and accessories. 52. xLib - Library mod for skill systems. 53. xSkills - Utilizes xLib for a full Skill Tree. Earn experience for a skill by performing actions under the skill. Get Ability Points on leveling the skill. Distribute your Ability Points to a skill's perks and gain powerful abilities!
roguehouse-classguide-text: Rogue House Guide to Character Classes 01. Rogue - Mixed Combat, Sneaky, Quick Slipping through the shadows, avoiding the Beasts that roam the lands. Far from the life you once had, but the only one you know of now. The Beasts have taught many lessons in stealth, ranged and melee combat. Constant movement keeps your weight down, keeping you light on your feet but less hardy. 02. Druid - Ranged Combat, Quick, Support None shall taint our forests for as long as We remain. Druids are protectors of the forests, masters of nature. They fill excellent support roles with their natural archery abilities and knowledge of plants. They despise the caves and the unnatural things within... 03. Hunter - Ranged Combat, Quick 04. Malfactor - Sneaky, 05. Commoner - Basic, no specializations 06. Tailor - Crafter 07. Clockmaker - Crafter 08. Blackguard - Melee Combat, Strong 09. Miner - Collector, Strong 10. Blacksmith - Crafter, Strong
